Oulton Broad Library

Manager: Jane Rothon

Council Offices, 92 Bridge Road, Oulton Broad
NR32 3LR

  • Tel: 01502 583135
  • Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk
  • Friends group: Friends of Oulton Broad Library
  • Facebook

Branch updates

Oulton Broad Library is looking for Home Library Service volunteers.

Opening hours

Day Hours
Monday 1000 – 1200
Tuesday 1000 – 1300, 1400 – 1700
Wednesday 1000 – 1300, 1400 – 1700
Thursday 1000 – 1300, 1400 – 1700
Friday 1000 – 1300, 1400 – 1800
Saturday 1000 – 1300, 1400 – 1700
Sunday 1100 – 1600

Room & venue hire

Room and space hire at Oulton Broad Library →

Branch facilities

  • Accessibility information
  • Payments: cash, cheques and cards accepted
  • Parking: available
  • Out-of-hours book return available
  • Free sanitary products available

IT and printing facilities

  • Free wifi
  • Book a computer
  • Photocopying: A4 available
  • Colour printing: A4 available
  • Scan to email
  • Printing, photocopying & scanning charges

Regular events and activities

Children's events

Craft activities: for primary school age children

Sunday, 1100-1445

Family playtime for 0-5 year olds

Monday, 1300-1430

Term-time only.

Lego club

every other Sunday, 1115-1215

Please contact the library for more details and to book place in advance. £1 per builder or £1.50 per family.

Older people's events

Top Time: events and activities for older people

Monday, 1030-1130

Reading groups

Youth book club: for children aged 12 to 15

two Sundays a month, 1400-1500

Refreshments provided. Please contact the library for more information.

IT help

Internet training session for beginners: book in advance

Sunday, 1100-1600

No upcoming special events.
